title: Advent of code 2015 day 04
Advent of code 2015 day 05
description: --- Day 5: Doesn't He Have Intern-Elves For This? ---
contents:
input <- read_lines(here("data/input/2015/05_input"))



Part 1


is_nice <- function(s) {
  
  cond1 <- str_count(s, "[aeiou]") >= 3
  cond2 <- str_count(s, "(.)\\1")
  cond3 <- str_detect(s, "ab|cd|pq|xy")
  
  cond1 & cond2 & !cond3
  
}

df <- tibble(s = input) %>% 
  mutate(nice = is_nice(s))

sum(df$nice)


[1] 258

Part 2


is_nice <- function(s) {
  
  cond1 <- str_detect(s, "(\\w{2}).*?(\\1)")
  cond2 <- str_detect(s, "(\\w{1}).(\\1)")

  cond1 & cond2
  
}

df <- tibble(s = input) %>% 
  mutate(nice = is_nice(s))

sum(df$nice)


[1] 53

title: Advent of code 2015 day 06
contents:
input <- read_lines(here("data", "input", "2015", "06_input"))

df <- tibble(input) %>%
  extract(input,
    into = c("action", "row_from", "col_from", "row_to", "col_to"),
    regex = "(turn on|turn off|toggle) (\\d+),(\\d+) through (\\d+),(\\d+)",
    convert = TRUE
  )



Part 1


lights <- function(action, row_from, col_from, row_to, col_to) {
  switch(action,
    "turn off" = m[row_from:row_to, col_from:col_to] <<- FALSE,
    "turn on" = m[row_from:row_to, col_from:col_to] <<- TRUE,
    "toggle" = m[row_from:row_to, col_from:col_to] <<-
      !m[row_from:row_to, col_from:col_to]
  )
}

m <- matrix(FALSE, nrow = 1000, ncol = 1000)
pwalk(
  list(df$action, df$row_from, df$col_from, df$row_to, df$col_to),
  lights
)

sum(m)


[1] 400410

Part 2


lights <- function(action, row_from, col_from, row_to, col_to) {
  switch(action,
    "turn off" = m[row_from:row_to, col_from:col_to] <<-
      m[row_from:row_to, col_from:col_to] - 1,
    "turn on" = m[row_from:row_to, col_from:col_to] <<-
      m[row_from:row_to, col_from:col_to] + 1,
    "toggle" = m[row_from:row_to, col_from:col_to] <<-
      m[row_from:row_to, col_from:col_to] + 2
  )

  m[row_from:row_to, col_from:col_to] <<-
    pmax(m[row_from:row_to, col_from:col_to], 0)
}

m <- matrix(0, nrow = 1000, ncol = 1000)

pwalk(
  list(df$action, df$row_from, df$col_from, df$row_to, df$col_to),
  lights
)

sum(m)


[1] 15343601

title: Advent of code 2015 day 03
description: --- Day 3: Perfectly Spherical Houses in a Vacuum ---
contents:
input <- read_lines(here("data/input/2015/03_input"))

# input <- "^v^v^v^v^v"

df <- input %>%
  str_split("") %>%
  enframe(name = NULL, value = "signal") %>%
  unnest(signal) %>%
  rowid_to_column(var = "step") %>%
  mutate(x = 0, y = 0) %>%
  add_row(.before = 1, step = 0, signal = "start", x = 0, y = 0) %>%
  mutate(x = ifelse(signal == "<", -1, x)) %>%
  mutate(x = ifelse(signal == ">", 1, x)) %>%
  mutate(y = ifelse(signal == "^", -1, y)) %>%
  mutate(y = ifelse(signal == "v", 1, y)) %>%
  mutate(xx = cumsum(x), yy = cumsum(y))



Part 1


df %>%
  count(xx, yy) %>%
  nrow()


[1] 2572

Part 2


df %>%
  mutate(
    santa = ifelse(step %% 2, "santa", "robot"),
    .before = 1
  ) %>%
  add_row(
    .after = 1,
    santa = "santa",
    step = 0,
    signal = "start",
    x = 0,
    y = 0
  ) %>%
  group_by(santa) %>%
  mutate(xx = cumsum(x), yy = cumsum(y)) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  count(xx, yy) %>% 
  nrow()


[1] 2631
